column5: Without a doubt, stickbaits work the best for me. The Rapala Husky Jerk, Rebel Fastrac, and Suspending Bomber Long A have often resulted in accidental smallmouth catches. This also results in a few fleeting seconds of thinking you have the worlds largest walleye on the line, until you realize that walleye don't jump.
No doubt in my mind a soft plastic grub or twister tail.
